title: Backlog
content: I enrolled for the May esa backlog registration. As someone from the first year, does that mean i’ll write it in june with the rest of my batchmates? Or when may? Im confused. And because i enroll what does it mean? Can i switch to july?

comments.body:
Send out a mail to exam coe or dycoe ,  they ll help you out.  
 [coe.pesu@pes.edu](mailto:coe.pesu@pes.edu)
Bro go to be block basement and talk to coe. I think for first years they only have summer term backlog test. Just check with coe

Yes I've confirmed with my teacher, she's said the may backlog is only for first years and we can apply only after esa.

She said the july backlog will happen mostly right after esas
